remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的类并接口提供对引用当前 HTTP 请求的对象。Classes that inherit the and interfaces are provided a reference to an object for the current HTTP request. 对象提供对内部函数访问， ，和请求的属性。The object provides access to the intrinsic , , and properties for the request. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此对象是准备好进行垃圾回收时完成。This object is ready for garbage collection when the is completed. 在请求完成之后其使用情况可能导致未定义的行为，如。Its usage after the request completes could lead to undefined behavior, such as a . > > 此对象是仅在由 ASP.NET 控制的线程中可用。This object is only available in the thread controlled by ASP.NET. 后台线程中的使用情况可能会导致未定义的行为。Usage in background threads could lead to undefined behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问和显示的属性对象。The following example demonstrates how to access and display properties of the object. 使用访问当前的 HTTP 请求的上下文属性的对象。The context of the current HTTP request is accessed by using the property of the object. span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.

value.span: 当异步 API 在不是预期的时间使用时 ASP.NET 将引发异常，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志未设置为`true`，检测到误用异步 API 的应用程序时，ASP.NET 将引发异常。If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API. 这可能尝试调用异步方法，在部分请求处理管道的异步操作不符合预期，或者如果仍未完成的异步工作时异步模块或处理程序发出信号完成。This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion. 此行为旨在作为其安全保障让你知道在早期，是否您要编写异步代码不符合预期模式，并且可能有负面影响。This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性需要在集成的管道模式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和至少.NET Framework 3.0 版。The property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0. 如果可用，则该属性返回值。When available, the property returns a value. 值属性指示在哪个事件实例当前正在处理该请求。The value of the property indicates which event in the instance is currently processing the request. 属性不应设置。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，设置[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 管道中请求的处理过程中。Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline. 设置属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定哪些事件的正在处理处理当前请求的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine what event of the object that is handling the current request is being processed. 在示例中，事件处理程序处理的多个事件对象，和属性确定哪些代码调用的每个事件进行处理。In the example, the event handler handles several events of the object, and the property determines what code is invoked for each event being handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 与集成模式中仅支持属性[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和至少.NET Framework 3.0。The property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0. 如果可用，该属性返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否在事件对象已完成处理。When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the object has finished processing. 属性不应设置。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，由提供[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]ASP.NET 运行时，每个通知。Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification. 设置属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 在方案中其中的多个事件对象由一个事件处理程序处理，则可以使用属性结合枚举来准确地确定在应用程序生命周期当前此处请求的。In scenarios where multiple events of the object are handled by one event handler, you can use the property in combination with the enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定在某一事件的对象已完成处理所有关联的事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine when an event of the object has finished processing all the associated event handlers. 在此示例中的自定义事件处理程序处理的多个事件对象，和使用属性来确定哪些代码调用处理特定事件后。The custom event handler in this example handles several events of the object, and the property is used to determine what code is invoked after a specific event is handled. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/CS/App_Code/TestModule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/VB/App_Code/TestModule.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法的类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，可以引用的成员.aspx 页而无需使用完全限定的类引用上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用`Request.Browser`用于获得客户端浏览器的功能。For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员必须从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，包括对引用中模块和对当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文的完全限定的引用命名空间和在类想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`. > [!NOTE] > 如果你尝试使用此属性，ASP.NET 将引发异常时对象不可用。ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the object is not available. 例如，这会在 Application_Start 方法中的 Global.asax 文件中，或从在 Application_Start 方法调用的方法中，则返回 true。For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method. 在该时间具有尚未创建任何 HTTP 请求。At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法的类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，可以引用的成员.aspx 页而无需使用完全限定的类引用上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用`Response.Write("some output")`将输出写入到 HTTP 输出流。For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员必须从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，包括对引用中模块和对当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文和中的类的完全限定的引用命名空间想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法资源的请求重定向到不同的路径比将由所请求的 URL。The method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL. 如果必须重置虚拟路径，以便从服务器资源的客户端请求正确解析，请使用采用此方法的重载`rebaseClientPath`参数并将该参数设置为`false`。If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`. URL 重写时，你想要重构的页中 Web 应用程序，并且你想要确保，已将旧 Url 加入书签的人仍然可以使用它们后移动页面。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写使您能够以透明方式将请求转发到新页的位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果你想要使站点能够为搜索引擎使用这些 Url 来更具用户友好性并进行了优化，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，以使网站以响应不会反映在网站上的文件结构的 Url。The following example shows how to use the method to enable a Web site to respond to URLs that do not reflect the file structure in the Web site. 第一个代码块是名为 RewritePath.aspx ASP.NET 网页。The first block of code is an ASP.NET Web page that is named RewritePath.aspx. 它需要查询字符串。It requires a query string. 如果你的网站名称是 WebSite1，URL`http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1`在浏览器中显示"第 1 页"。If the name of your site is WebSite1, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` displays "Page 1" in the browser. 执行网页的代码块是`Application_BeginRequest`Global.asax 文件中的事件处理程序。The block of code that follows the Web page is the `Application_BeginRequest` event handler in the Global.asax file. 此代码的 Url 截获请求如`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`并将其转换到窗体所需的 RewritePath.aspx 进行处理之前。This code intercepts requests for URLs such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` and converts them to the form that is required for RewritePath.aspx before they are processed. 因此，URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` RewritePath.aspx 调用与在浏览器中显示"第 1 页"的查询字符串参数。Therefore, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` invokes RewritePath.aspx with the query-string parameter that displays "Page 1" in the browser. 如果 URL，例如`http://localhost/WebSite1/page1`收到时，重载调用，使您可以提供一个值属性，以及查询字符串参数。If a URL such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` is received, an overload of is invoked that enables you to provide a value for the property as well as a query string parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法的类。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，可以引用的成员.aspx 页而无需使用完全限定的类引用上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用`Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`若要在服务器上创建 COM 对象的实例。For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员必须从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，包括对引用中模块和对当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文的完全限定的引用命名空间和在类想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在处理程序和模块使用的属性来实现协作取消，您可能希望禁用请求超时时，默认情况下执行 ASP.NET 的行为。此属性设置为`false`可以帮助您确保取消和清理例程将运行而无需 ASP.NET 被中断。In handlers and modules that are using the property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out. Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET. 如果此属性设置为`false`，ASP.NET 将不会自动与"请求已超时"错误页时显示发生超时。If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs. 应用程序负责适当地设置响应内容。The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供以编程方式访问的属性和方法的接口。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the interface. 因为 ASP.NET 页包含对的默认引用命名空间 (其中包含类)，可以引用的成员.aspx 页而无需使用完全限定的类引用上。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用`User.Identity.Name`若要获取的用户的名称，代表当前进程正在运行。For example, you can use `User.Identity.Name` to get the name of the user on whose behalf the current process is running. 但是，如果你想要使用的成员必须从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块，包括对引用中模块和对当前处于活动状态的请求/响应上下文的完全限定的引用命名空间和在类想要使用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中必须指定完全限定的名称`HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问通过当前用户的属性属性。The following example shows how to access properties of the current user through the property. 这些属性用于设置 Web 页的标题。Those properties are used to set the title of the Web page. 如果应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证，用户名将包括域。If the application uses Windows authentication, the user name includes the domain. 例如，页面标题将"主页上的域 \ 用户名"。For example, the page title would be "Home page for DOMAIN\username". [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpContext.User#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpContext.User/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpContext.User#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpContext.User/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
